meta.title: Become a distribution partner | Alforis TPM
meta.description: Join the asset managers we represent. Selectivity, strategic alignment and transparency for lasting collaboration.

hero.title: Join the 3 to 5 asset managers we represent per market
hero.subtitle: Selectivity, alignment, transparency: the Alforis TPM signature
hero.intro: We're not an opportunistic distributor stacking mandates. We build lasting partnerships with a handful of carefully selected asset managers.

philosophy.title: Our partnership philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: We favor lasting relationships, not stacked mandates

selectivity.title: Deliberate selectivity
selectivity.desc: Maximum 3-5 simultaneous mandates per market. This voluntary limitation guarantees genuine strategic focus and unwavering attention to each partner.

alignment.title: Strategic alignment
alignment.desc: We work exclusively with firms whose investment philosophy we understand and share. No 'catalog' representation.

independence.title: Total independence
independence.desc: No banking shareholders, no distribution bias. Our only priority: our partners' commercial success in our markets.

philosophy.quote: « Working with Alforis means being chosen, not simply represented. »

eligibility.title: Eligibility criteria
eligibility.subtitle: The fundamentals for successful collaboration

ucits.title: Registered UCITS or AIFM funds
ucits.desc: Your structure must be regulated (UCITS V, AIFMD) with authorization to market in Europe. We support compliance setup if needed.

aum.title: Minimum €100M AUM
aum.desc: Indicative threshold ensuring solid operational structure. Exceptions possible for spin-offs from recognized teams or highly differentiating strategies.

philosophy.title: Clear investment thesis
philosophy.desc: Differentiating philosophy, demonstrable track record, explainable investment process. We refuse 'me-too' products without added value.

marketing.title: Marketing & compliance support available
marketing.desc: Product documentation (factsheets, KIID/KID, SFDR), investor presentations, due diligence materials. We help with local adaptation but don't start from scratch.

commitment.title: Long-term commitment (>12 months)
commitment.desc: Institutional distribution is a marathon. We seek partners ready to invest in a multi-year relationship, not opportunistic 6-month mandates.

eligibility.note: Note: These criteria are indicative. Each application is evaluated individually. We decline approximately 70% of requests to guarantee the quality of our support.

onboarding.title: Onboarding process
onboarding.subtitle: From application to commercial launch: 6 to 8 weeks

initial.title: Initial confidential discussion
initial.desc: 45-minute exploratory call to understand your objectives, validate mutual alignment, present our approach.

review.title: Marketing materials review
review.desc: Audit of your materials (factsheets, presentations, track record). Identification of necessary adaptations for our markets.

compliance.title: Compliance & AFTPM validation
compliance.desc: Verification of European passports, SFDR/MiFID II compliance, AFTPM code adherence. Mutual due diligence.

contract.title: TPM contract signature
contract.desc: Finalization of commercial terms (retainer, success fee, geographic exclusivity), distribution mandate signature.

launch.title: Market plan launch
launch.desc: Target mapping, roadshow planning, CRM integration, first institutional meetings. Let's go!

testimonial.title: They trusted us
testimonial.subtitle: Testimonials from current partners
testimonial.quote: In 18 months, our Alforis representative opened 7 institutional doors in Spain and Portugal, of which 4 resulted in mandates. Their market knowledge and selective approach make all the difference.
testimonial.author: Equity Boutique (UK)

cta.title: Ready to apply?
cta.subtitle: Let's start with a 45-minute exploratory discussion
cta.description: Together we evaluate strategic alignment and determine if a partnership makes sense for both parties.

process.title: What you can expect from the first discussion:
steps: Presentation of your asset management firm and distribution objectives
Assessment of fit with our approach and markets
Frank discussion about mutual expectations and economic model
Next steps if alignment confirmed (or transparent feedback if mismatch)
